name: Combat Company
description: Combat Company is a free beta-stage browser-based multiplayer first person shooter game built on Unity 3D engine. Combat Company is being updated everyday by only one developer, which started this project in march 2013 from scratch. Besides the Unity 3D player, Combat Company doesn't require you to download any parts of the game or any kind of plugin on your computer. Also feel free to write down your suggestions on our forums!
